title: >>> A Super HERO
body_text:
The DODGEBALL XXX-SEVEN poster features one of the most beloved players in the history of the game. He debuted at DODGEBALL DAY 2 on September 4th, and has since brought a level of intensity and comedy like no other.
Steve Adams, the very first of the infamous Adams brothers to play, is without question one of the main reasons why dodgeball is still around today. His dedication and well-known fact that he has brought many of his outside friends, and relatives, into the circle of dodgeball are all key factors in the success of the game itself. It is very safe to say that without Steve Adams, dodgeball would not be the same.
As Steve has been quoted in the past, "37" is his favorite number. There isn't a more fitting poster for him to cover than DODGEBALL XXX-SEVEN.
----------------------------------------
DODGEBALL XXX-SEVEN, only the eighth Friday event, is one of the most unpredictable events in the history of the sport.
With a few good string of events as far as attendance is concerned, DODGEBALL 36 saw a large drop with 12. It is highly unlikely the same will happen for DODGEBALL XXX-SEVEN, mainly in part to weather reports claiming beautiful weather.
Tag Team Warfare
Captains battles have become more and more interesting in recent weeks, especially among John Tronolone. The idea of Tag-Team Captains Matches has been a taboo idea for some time. While the games might not see much of a change, a fun new way of choosing teams may come about.
The first rumored tag team battle, if of course all participants agree [and attend], would be between the "Allied Powers" Award winners:
Steve Adams and Travis Mills
vs.
Lauren Freda and Valerie Winston
What will become of this possible tag team captains match?
All the questions will be answered come this Friday, April 28th. The final April 2006 event takes place at Wall High School, with start time of 6:30.
----------------------------------------
May Schedule
The following is a schedule of events for the upcoming month:
Saturday, May 6th ~ DODGEBALL 38
Saturday, May 13th ~ DODGEBALL 39
Saturday, May 20th ~ DODGEBALL 40
Saturday, May 27th ~ DODGEBALL 41
As of the moment, no events have a scheduled venue. Those will be decided in the upcoming weeks. Start time for all events, unless specified, is 6:30.
Also, if you have birthday coming up and do NOT want to play dodgeball on it [or miss an event because of it], the schedule can always be altered.
Poster Contest
There will be a poster contest in the month of June, most likely for DODGEBALL 42. An official date has yet to be determined, but it is a good time to jot some ideas down. Everyone, even non-players, are eligible to enter.
